title: Awesome Location - Live, Work, Play. Lease Special!
posting_body: Living here means coming home a luxury lifestyle that has been graced with the perfect balance of contemporary features and unparalleled community amenities.
Located in thriving Uptown - you can live, work and play without ever getting in a car or setting foot out of the neighborhood.
And, you will have immediate access to Dallas’ finest restaurants and trendiest nightspots.
Call/text Lori at Spirit Real Estate Group
Not all units have the same features or amenities pictured.
Availability, pricing, and specials are subject to change daily depending on market conditions.
Pricing or specials in the ads are not always updated accordingly.

We service Downtown Dallas, Uptown Dallas, Richardson, Highland Village, Old East Dallas, East Dallas, Frisco, Plano, Mckinney, Allen, North Dallas, Carrollton, Farmers Branch, Lewisville, Grapevine, Las Colinas, and all of the DFW Metroplex.
**Ask us how to receive a cash rebate**
